name: Xenorealm Conqueror: Card Game
description:
Easy to learn but hard to master!

In Xenorealm, you can use unique heroes, powerful minions and versatile spells to defeat your opponents.

Can you stand out in this ever-changing battlefield?

Can you turn the tables using tactics?

Join us! Challenge your limits! Enjoy the journey!  

■ Turn-Based Tactics Card Game

Enjoy the fun of building decks.

■ Versus Mode

Duel players from around the world!

■ Practice Mode

Optimize decks! Hone skills!

■ Survival Mode

Defeat as many enemies as you can with 1 chance only!

■ Leaderboard

Make yourself seen to the world!

- Join Discord Now! Find people to match with you, most important, share your thoughts! Official Discord Channel - *** NOTE *** Xenorealm Conqueror is currently in development and still in demo phase. Any data might be deleted in the future.
